entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Murdochville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:09 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
